about_the_game:
Story

The year is 2092, after the failure of the 2030 Agenda and worsening environmental catastrophes, major corporations began colonizing space.
Space colonies, in orbit and on planets like Mars, were occupied by the wealthy, while the poor on Earth suffer the consequences.
As a Bounty Hunter, you travel through the solar system in search of contracts to ensure the survival of your family and those left behind.

Old School

Hand painted 16-bit pixel art and animations mixed with an amazing synthesized soundtrack.

Features

  • Story mode with 4 characters to unlock;
  • 15 Levels to master;
  • 5 "Most Wanted" Boss Fights;
  • Weapons that level up as you defeat enemies.
detailed_description:
Story

The year is 2092, after the failure of the 2030 Agenda and worsening environmental catastrophes, major corporations began colonizing space.
Space colonies, in orbit and on planets like Mars, were occupied by the wealthy, while the poor on Earth suffer the consequences.
As a Bounty Hunter, you travel through the solar system in search of contracts to ensure the survival of your family and those left behind.

Old School

Hand painted 16-bit pixel art and animations mixed with an amazing synthesized soundtrack.

Features

  • Story mode with 4 characters to unlock;
  • 15 Levels to master;
  • 5 "Most Wanted" Boss Fights;
  • Weapons that level up as you defeat enemies.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel X64 architecture | Apple M1 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: StellarFighter: Galactica

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560TI or AMD 5870

short_description: Lead your starfighter as a bounty hunter, complete contracts and fight your way to free your home system from a criminal empire full of conspiracies and underworld secrets, in this hard boiled action old school arcade shooter.
